long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension for knowledge manage: store cheat sheets and links, browser sessions. 

Allows:
- add note about something,
- add tags to the note,
- full-text search by tags with autocomplete, error correction,
- save tab and browser sessions,
- restore sessions and close duplicate tabs,
- use markdown for highlight important, numeric and unnumbered list,
- copy code blocks and notes.
